Title: Authorizes George Amendola Tier II status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes George Amendola Tier II status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize George A. Amendola Tier II status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
